pullrequest.title: Re-wrote the instructions to specify gazebo plugins within a ROS URDF file.

content.raw:
This PR is based on this conversation: [http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21049/joint-and-link-plugins-do-they-really-exist/](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21049/joint-and-link-plugins-do-they-really-exist/)

Basically, I had a really hard time understanding that a lot of information regarding plugin specification in URDF, both on ROS-side and Gazebo-side is plain wrong.

So I wrote this PR for future adventurers.
content.html:
This PR is based on this conversation: http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21049/joint-and-link-plugins-do-they-really-exist/

Basically, I had a really hard time understanding that a lot of information regarding plugin specification in URDF, both on ROS-side and Gazebo-side is plain wrong.

So I wrote this PR for future adventurers.
